description: A self-described hair color expert pointed out that the "Keeping Up With the Kardashians" star isn't keeping up during the coronavirus lockdown.
title: Kylie Jenner Goes Off On Commenter Who Criticized Her Hair: 'I Know Bitch'
title_page: Kylie Jenner Goes Off On Commenter Who Criticized Her Hair: 'I Know Bitch' | HuffPost
maintext:

â€œA visual representation of how my friends are gonna have to drag me out the first party post quarantine,â€ Jenner joked in the caption.
